channel.title: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1
channel.description:
Hey every1, i tried to make myself admin on phatt-isle v1 but it didn't worked, i changed the names to my names in login.java and compiled, then restarted the server and still was a normal player!
this is my oi compiler [code]@echo off cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java pause[/code]
is something wrong with that or is it just the source?

item.title: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

I know what the prob was ^^ it wasn’t what you 2 said, i spelled my name with a capital but my name was without ^^, still thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1

item.title: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1
item.dc:creator: @doesnt_matter doesnt matter
item.description:
@doesnt_matter wrote:

and also make sure you are not logged into your server when you save it (stupid mistake)(sarcasm kills)

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1

item.title: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

[quote=“klomp3, post:1, topic:270909”]Hey every1, i tried to make myself admin on phatt-isle v1 but it didn’t worked, i changed the names to my names in login.java and compiled, then restarted the server and still was a normal player!

this is my oi compiler

@echo off cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java pause

is something wrong with that or is it just the source?[/quote]

   Klomp3

 Make sure your changing login.java to the right admin number

I’ve also had a problem like this but it was resolved because i would turn my server off for a mere sec while i compiled, then when the compile was done i would run my server again.

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Making myself admin on phatt-isle v1
